Entries.LeahHouse_5_5: Can you give me any tips on this art piece, Elena?$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Victor: Elena? I've read a few of her short stories. They're not my usual style, but the way she describes the beauty of the natural world is pretty phenomenal.$0#$b#Maybe I'll work up the courage to tell her sometime.$3

Entries.CommunityDay_Victor_Married: How well do you know Elena? ..No, I'm not jealous! I was just wondering if you could introduce us. It's silly, but I've read some of her work, and I feel like we could have a lot to talk about.$0
